text: Pathfinder (original title in Sami: Ofelaš and in Norwegian: Veiviseren) is a 1987 Norwegian action adventure movie directed by Nils Gaup and stars Mikkel Gaup, Nils Utsi, Sara Marit Gaup, Inger Utsi, Helgi Skúlason. It was distributed by Carolco Pictures and was nominated for an Academy Award in 1988. It was remade in 2007. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1987 action movies Category:1987 adventure movies Category:Norwegian action movies Category:Norwegian adventure movies Category:Movies directed by Nils Gaup
title: Pathfinder (1987 movie)
